tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SalesData (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sale_date DATE,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    customer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customers(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
    sales_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity_sold INT,
    sale_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
